attributes.action: PIP IMPLANTS - HELP FOR ALL BRITISH VICTIMS
attributes.additional_details:
WE demand that the Government urgently acknowledges the serious risks to health for women implanted with PIP breast implants and where the clinics are still practicing, order private clinics to remove and replace (if the patient requires) all PIP Implants without cost to the patient.
Women across the country are sick and disfigured as a result of these implants.
Urgent action is required to treat all women before any further damage can happen.
